title: 282. Could Solving This One Problem Solve All the Others?
description: The biggest problem with humanity is humans themselves. Too often, we make choices — what we eat, how we spend our money and time — that undermine our well-being. An all-star team of academic researchers thinks it has the solution: perfecting the science of behavior change. Will it work?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
